product_metadata.plan_type: Non-Linked, Participating, Individual Life Insurance Savings Plan
product_metadata.key_positioning: Flexible plan where customer designs income/lump sum structure

product_summary.objective: Bajaj Life ACE allows customers to design their financial returns through flexible combinations of income or lump sum payout options, while ensuring life cover throughout the policy term up to 100 years of age.
key_highlights: Flexibility: Choose income, lump sum or both
4 Product Options: Deferred Income, Early Income, Increasing Income, Wealth
Guaranteed Income payable as % of Benefit Sum Assured
Cash Bonuses and Terminal Bonus (if declared) under participating plan
Goal Protection Benefit (GPB): Policy continues even after death during PPT
Option to accumulate income benefits at 10-year G-Sec linked return
Maturity benefit includes 105% premiums paid + accumulated payouts + terminal bonus

plan_variants.income_start: From end of 1st month/year after deferment

plan_variants.special_feature: Benefit Sum Assured increases at 5% p.a. compounded

plan_variants.maturity_amount: Maturity Sum Assured Rate × Annualized Premium + Bonuses (if declared)

core_benefits.details: Sum Assured on Death + accumulated income benefits (105%) + Terminal Bonus (if declared).
core_benefits.guaranteed_floor: Guaranteed Death Benefit = 105% of Total Premiums Paid

core_benefits.details: On maturity policyholder receives: 105% of total premiums paid + accumulated income benefits (if any) + Terminal Bonus (if declared).
Maturity Sum Assured Rate × Annualized Premium + Simple Reversionary Bonus + Terminal Bonus (if declared).
Declared annually depending on company performance. Payable as income under Options 1–3.
May be declared at maturity or death depending on bonus performance.

goal_protection_benefit.description: If death occurs during PPT, nominee receives Sum Assured on Death + 5% of accumulated income. Policy continues with no future premiums, and benefits continue till maturity.

accumulate_income_benefits.withdrawal: Partial or full withdrawal allowed anytime

policy_loan.limit: 80% of surrender value + 50% terminal bonus portion

surrender_and_lapse_rules.surrender_value: Higher of Guaranteed Surrender Value (GSV) or Special Surrender Value (SSV).
surrender_and_lapse_rules.lapse_rule: If no surrender value acquired, policy lapses after grace period.
surrender_and_lapse_rules.paid_up_rule: Policy converts to reduced paid-up if surrender value acquired.

compliance_guardrails.participating_bonus_disclaimer: Bonuses are not guaranteed and depend on company performance.
compliance_guardrails.guaranteed_floor: Death benefit will not be less than 105% of premiums paid.
compliance_guardrails.free_look_period: 30 days from receipt of policy document.
compliance_guardrails.suicide_exclusion: Within 12 months, nominee gets higher of 80% premiums paid or surrender value.
compliance_guardrails.fraud_warning: IRDAI does not sell policies or announce bonuses.

retrieval_chunks.text: Bajaj Life ACE offers Deferred Income, Early Income, Increasing Income and Wealth options which can be combined to design returns.
GPB ensures policy continues even if death occurs during PPT, with nominee receiving benefits till maturity without future premiums.
Guaranteed income equals 4% of Benefit Sum Assured in Deferred/Early Income and 2% in Increasing Income option.
Cash Bonus and Terminal Bonus may be declared annually based on company performance and are not guaranteed.
Entry age ranges from 0–60 (without GPB) and maturity age can extend up to 100 years under whole life option.
